item.title: stella koh
item.description: Eunjeong (Stella) Koh cv Research Interests Music Information Retrieval, Machine Learning for Audio/Music Applications, Sound Design, Auditory Perception & Cognition Education Sep 2016 – Ph.D. Student at Music, UC San Diego, CA 2012 – 2014. M.S. Engineering at Music & Audio Research Group, Seoul National University, South Korea (advisor: Kyogu Lee) 2008 – 2012. B.S. Computer Science and Engineering at Ewha Womans University, South Korea Experiences

item.title: music listening test
item.description:
listen carefully to the following songs. click on the play button to hear the songs. adjust the volume if needed. Song 1 taeyeon
H3 sample This is quotation This is quotation This is quotation via http://www.example.com/ It is quotation sample. H4 sample package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hello, Hugo!") } Try Go It is codehighlight.
